mapper.select: SELECT u.userName, v.reason, v.startTime, v.endTime, v.way, v.state, v.requestTime FROM vacation v, user u WHERE v.userNum = u.userNum AND u.userNum = #{userNum};

SELECT u.userName, v.reason, v.startTime, v.endTime, v.way, v.state, v.requestTime FROM vacation v, (SELECT userNum, userName FROM user WHERE collegeNum = #{collegeNum}) u WHERE v.userNum = u.userNum;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vacation(reason, startTime, endTime, state, userNum, requestTime, way) VALUES (#{reason}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{state}, #{userNum}, #{requestTime}, #{way})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM vacation WHERE vacationNum = #{vacationNum} AND state = 0
